text: fresh works is a company that provides
customer for life software essentially
what that means is we think about
customer engagement not so much as a
transaction but as a journey we did not
want our customers to have to be
burdened by building the infrastructure
building an app and hosted somewhere
else and manage that app somewhere else
just to be able to do that interaction
so we relied upon functions as a service
or lambda to actually enable those types
of integrations we are doing today
millions of these app implications in a
day if we had to not you know rely upon
on lambda we would have had to create
not only the infrastructure to manage it
we would have had to create a team of
engineers were actually running this
obviously security is is a primary
concern as well as a primary driver for
us to actually choose lambda essentially
we are in the business of running

this integration lambda actually runs
third-party code day-in and day-out we
are extremely focused on looking at the

just for the sake of doing that it's

customers don't have to worry about that
because they just rely on us and we rely
